body: why the cover looks like rui & hina

The plot of the last manga: Two young lovers were separated and they made some promise to meet there at the shrine but the girl didn’t go. Years later they meet again there and the girl is getting married. She said that her old house was sold and her family wasn’t doing very well financially. Her fiancé kinda helped her family and she does like him. Later she confesses that she was gonna come here to say goodbye but she couldn’t do it. At the end they engaged in passionate sex.
Whats the plot on the last Hentai Manga?
I thought this was Domestic Girlfriend parody
